description: Complete system overview focusing on the multi-agent architecture, workflow orchestration, and key components of the content creation platform
Detailed documentation of the agent-based workflow system, including agent roles (Marcus, Giorgio, Cassidy, Jamal, Letitia), delegation patterns, and inter-agent communication flows
Technical specification of the workflow engine, including task dependencies, state machine implementation, parallel execution management, and auto-execution algorithms
Documentation of the multi-modal content processing system, including file type detection, workflow suggestion algorithms, and processing rules for different content types
Detailed documentation of creative content generation algorithms, including AI integration, template systems, and multi-modal content generation pipelines
